text: Okugyako abo be mwakola nabo e ndagaano mu bagatta ku Katonda e bintu e birala, oluvanyuma ne batamenya katundu konna mu ndagaano eyo, era nebatayamba muntu yenna abalwanyisa. (abo) mubajjulize e ndagaano yaabwe okutuusa e kiseera kya bwe lwe kiggwako, anti mazima ddala Katonda ayagala nnyo abamutya
